body_html: Hello, I abandoned the double GPU setup. I kept only the Quadro P400, and I am intending to reinstall everything from scratch. This problem was probably, essentially, due to a bad connection between Cuda and the GPU version of Tensorflow. I think that it is suitable to close the issue as I may have understood what the source of the problem was.

body: Hello, I abandoned the double GPU setup. I kept only the Quadro P400, and I am intending to reinstall everything from scratch. This problem was probably, essentially, due to a bad connection between Cuda and the GPU version of Tensorflow. I think that it is suitable to close the issue as I may have understood what the source of the problem was.
